DoSlide

A flexibly-configured, easily-extensible switch pattern with functionalities.

To create fullscreen scrolling

Want to be infinite? or horizontal? or nested? or... No problem at all!

To create slider

Just add a timer to DoSlide object, then you get a slider.

To custom transition

Apply new effect easily with event callbacks and inner tool library.

To do something else

Take what you need to do what you want.
